name: Retro Three Kingdoms
description:
▶ Low spec - PC MMORPG (MOBA Inside)
▶ Not Based On Pay2Win. Your time is precious.
▶ Endless war between three countries (1000 on 1000)



▶ A game based on 170 years of Chinese 「Han(漢) Dynasty」 history
▶ Make a sworn brothers relationship with other players.
▶ Join the army and engage in massive battles.
▶ Join the AOS in the game. All players start with the same item and level.
